pkgmetadata.longdescription: QuakeSpasm is a Quake 1 engine based on the SDL port of FitzQuake. It includes 64bit CPU support, a new sound driver, several networking fixes and a few graphical niceities.

use.flag: Embed custom Quakespasm console background picture
Install the shareware version of Quake games-fps/quake1-demodata
Use media-libs/libmad as the mp3 codec
Use media-sound/mpg123 as the mp3 codec
Use media-libs/sdl-net for network play support
Use media-libs/tremor as the OggVorbis codec
Use media-libs/libvorbis as the OggVorbis codec
